actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Resolution amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to require the Clerk of the House to call the roll on the vote on final passage of any bill or resolution affecting any compensation of any Member or ex-Member of the House and to record such vote.

summary.text: Amends rule XXI of the Rules of the House of Representatives to require the Clerk to call the roll on the vote on final passage of any bill, or final adoption of any resolution, affecting the compensation of a Member or ex-Member, and to record such vote.

titles.title: Resolution amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to require the Clerk of the House to call the roll on the vote on final passage of any bill or resolution affecting any compensation of any Member or ex-Member of the House and to record such vote.
